resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105136</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105136</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206279</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Particle Adventure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Partikel-Abenteuer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Aventure de Particules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Aventura Da Partícula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Avventura Della Particella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιπέτεια μορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Aventura De la Partícula</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">introduces, through an interactive adventure tour, the theory of fundamental particles and forces. It also looks at why physicists want to go beyond the Standard Model theory. In addition, the site offers a discussion board.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt, durch eine interaktive Abenteuertour, die 
Theorie der grundlegenden Partikel und die Kräfte vor. Sie 
betrachtet auch, warum Physiker über der vorbildlichen 
Standardtheorie hinaus gehen möchten. Zusätzlich bietet die 
Site ein Diskussion Brett an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente, par une excursion interactive 
d'aventure, la théorie de particules fondamentales et des forces. 
Elle regarde également pourquoi les physiciens veulent aller au
delà de la théorie modèle standard. En outre, le site offre 
un panneau de discussion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">introduz, com uma excursão interativa da 
aventura, a teoria de partículas fundamentais e forças. Olha 
também porque os físicos querem ir além da teoria modelo padrão. 
Além, o local oferece uma placa da discussão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">introduce, con un giro interattivo di avventura, 
la teoria delle particelle fondamentali e le forze. Egualmente 
guarda perchè i fisici desiderano andare oltre la teoria di modello 
standard. In più, il luogo offre un bordo di discussione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εισάγει, μέσω ενός διαλογικού γύρου περιπέτειας, τη 
θεωρία των θεμελιωδών μορίων και των δυνάμεων. Εξετάζει 
επίσης γιατί οι φυσικοί θέλουν να υπερβούν την πρότυπη πρότυπη 
θεωρία. Επιπλέον, η περιοχή προσφέρει έναν πίνακα 
συζήτησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">introduce, con un viaje interactivo de la 
aventura, la teoría de partículas fundamentales y fuerzas. 
También mira porqué los físicos desean ir más allá de la 
teoría modelo estándar. Además, el sitio ofrece a tarjeta de 
la discusión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206279</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105136</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-particle-adventure</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
